welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Zionsville, USA! Known for its quaint Main Street and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience the unique charm of our town."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis Executive Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a waiting area.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Indianapolis Executive Airport caters to the needs of private and corporate aircraft, with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves Southwest Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mount Comfort Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mount Comfort Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
